title: Elegant Ruby & Diamond Vanki Bangle - Chandrika Collection
materials: G-H Color). Features a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced brilliance.
features: This exquisite Vanki bangle showcases intricate filigree work (jalli design) around a central ruby cabochon. The openwork design is embellished with pavé-set diamonds, creating a delicate yet impactful statement. The bangle is designed for comfort and secure wear, featuring a secure clasp. The central motif draws inspiration from traditional South Indian floral patterns.
occasions: and special occasions such as seemantham (baby shower) or half-saree function (Langa Voni). Can also be styled for modern cocktail parties and celebrations.
description: This Vanki bangle blends traditional South Indian artistry with modern sensibilities. The natural ruby, a symbol of prosperity and passion, is complemented by the brilliance of meticulously set diamonds. The 22K gold ensures lasting value and durability. Its unique design makes it a heirloom-worthy piece, reflecting rich cultural heritage and exquisite craftsmanship.
